name: Advanced Reports
description:
Provides additional report types for use in projects.  View documentation on GitHub
Report types: Gantt, Instrument Query, PDF, Record Table, SQL*
* Only administrators can create/edit SQL reports.

system-settings.name: Only allow administrators to save reports with Public access
Only allow administrators to save reports with API access
Only allow administrators to save reports with editable fields
Allow SQL reports to be used as the source for PDF reports

project-settings.name: Allow users with project design and setup rights to edit reports
Allow users with add/edit/organize reports rights to edit reports

action-tags.description: Saves an advanced report to a file upload field upon form submission. Please refer to the module documentation for instructions on using this action tag.
